tika-s0305t7:3_0: 899-900.Chattiṁsāyaṭhānesūti ajjhattaṁ kāye samudayadhammānupassī, vayo, samudayavayo, bahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayo, ajjhattabahiddhā samudayo, vayo,
tika-s0305t7:3_2: tathā vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṁ chattiṁsāya ṭhānesu.
tika-s0305t7:3_3: Dutiye dvādasasu ṭhānesūti kāye ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā,
tika-s0305t7:3_4: vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṁ dvādasasu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0305t7:5_0: 901.Imāya pāḷiyāti imāya hīnattikapāḷiyā. Ime dhammā hīnā lāmakaṭṭhena.
tika-s0305t7:5_1: Ime dhammā majjhimā hīnapaṇītānaṁ majjhe bhavāti.
tika-s0305t7:7_5: Dasacakkavāḷasahassaṁ ekāvajjanassa āpāthaṁ āgacchati tathā ālokavaḍḍhanassa katattā.
tika-s0305t7:12_1: Sāvakānampi attano abhinīhārānurūpaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattatīti te kālapadesavasena ceva yathāparicayasattapadesavasena ca ṭhānānīti jānanti,
tika-s0305t7:12_2: sammāsambuddhānaṁ pana anantañāṇatāya sabbattheva appaṭihatameva ñāṇanti āha – ‘‘sabbaññubuddhānaṁ panā’’tiādi.
tika-s0305t7:12_3: Etaṁ dasabalañāṇaṁ anantavisayattā nippadesaṁ anūnatāya sabbākāraparipūraṁ.
